channel.title: GR on Wonderful World
channel.description: Recent content in GR on Wonderful World

item.title: Apella Beach
item.description: Backed by a mountain with pine trees, this scenic beach offers clear water & chair/umbrella rentals.

item.title: Navagio Beach
item.description: Iconic pebble beach between towering cliffs with a shipwreck & turquoise water, reached by boat.
